data.title: BlairsBio
data.text:
Blair Cramer came to Llanview in October, 1993 intending to do whatever it took to become powerful and wealthy.While working as a journalistic apprentice at The Banner, Blair set her sights on rich Asa Buchanan. However, Blair soon encountered Max Holden! The sexual chemistry between them as they soon shared a sizzling midnight dance on New Year's Eve.

Though Max was persisted in pursuing Blair in 1992, she was busy wooing Asa Buchanan away from his wife, Renee. Blair was equally determined to claw her way to the top of the bussiness world, even if it meant destroying her own Aunt Dorian to do it. Finding a skeleton in Dorians closet, she used it as blackmail to force her into to making her the new Editor- and- chief of Llanviews tabloid newspaper, The Intruder.

Max Holden was determined to stop Blair from marrying Asa Buchanan. On Asa's and Blairs wedding day -- June 16, 1992-- passion exploded for Max and Blair. They made love-- on top of Blair's wedding dress! Still, Blair went through with the wedding, but when she wouldnt sleep with her husband, her marriage was doomed. Left with nothing, Blair departed Llanview. In December 1993, Blair came back and found a cosmetics company.. Melador. After failing to winning Max back, Blair crossed paths with Llanviews other pariah, Todd Manning. She found him intriguring-- and he was equally attracted to her. Blair took Todd back to her appartment and made love to him.

When she discovered, in 1995, that Todd was Victor Lord's long-lost son and worht 27.8 millions dollars. Blair plotted to marry him by saying she was pregnant. When a suspicious Toddforced his new wife, Blair take a pregnancy test. It came out postive! Tradgey broke when Blair was mugged on the docks and lost Todd's baby. Thanks to Max, Todd found out Blair's fake pregnancy and divorced her. Then Blair discovered she was pregnant-- again! When Todd found out, they reconciled and married again at the St. James church. Just before their honeymoon, Todd was shot and purportley killed in Ireland while helping Marty Saybrrok and her friend Patrick Thornheart.

On January 8th, 1996, The "widow Manning" gave birth to a duaghter named Starr. During the following summer, Todd Manning returned from the dead, only to see Blair in Patricks arms, about to make love. Reeling from the sight of his wife in the arms that was responsible of his "Death", Todd rejected Blair. Though they were forced to work together, sexual tensions filled the room whenever Todd and Blair were together. Just when it appeared that Todd and Blair were going to reconcile, Blair discovered she was pregnant with Patricks baby!

In 1997, Blair's life was turned upside down when her daughter Starr, fell ill with aplastic anemia. Blairs unborn son, was found to be a match. However before it could take place. Blair lost the baby in an car accident. Fortunatly, Starr's life was spared by a donor, Alex Olanov. Blair, who was injured from the crash, left for Philidelphia for surgery. Upon her return, the question was will Blair and Todd reunite?

While recoupring from her recovery, Blair is living with her Aunt Dorian at The Old Saybrook Mansion- 202 Lincoln Drive.

Blair went back to Max Holden. She married him in 1999. She helped Max tell Asa that he was his long lost son. Max and Blair pulled it off. They were very good con-artists. Blair and Max lived with each other as Mr. and Mrs. Buchanan. After awhile, Max saw Skye Chandler and invited her to stay at the Buchanan house. Max had an affair with Skye fir a long time. Blair also knew about it. She tried so hard to get rid of Skye. Skye had enough and chopped her long blonde hair off. Blair needed to get revenge on Max and put a virus on a computer website to say " MAX HOLDEN IS A FRAUD."

Todd Manning has come back to town, Blair and Max were getting a long more, and she wanted Todd to take off the virus. Todd was intrested in Blair again, so he didnt take it off. A not knowning Blair had thought it was gone. Max and Blair re-newed their vows. The very next day, the virus came out. Max so it and dumped Blair and kicked her out. Blair saw Skye and Max make love. Blair saw red and shot Max in the back. Todd helped Blair cover from shooting Max. Todd and Blair got closer. Todd proposed to Blair on New Years Eve. Blair accepted. Max couldnt have Blair marrying Todd, He druged Blair the night before their wedding and put him and Blar in bed together. Skye had Todd go check on Blair, to see a Max and Blair in bed together. The wedding was still on, Blair unknowing what Max did, still came to the wedding. Todd exposed Blair, Max and Ben's secret that night. Todd and Blair ened up in jail for their honeymoon.

Todd later found out that Max pulled the wool over his eyes, but it was to late. Todd had already turned in Blair's clothes. Blair trying hard to get Max to drop the charges. Blair told Max she was pregant. Max took Blair to the hospital to get tested and it came up pistive. Blair had thought it was Max's but later found out it was really Todd's baby. Todd was already furious at Blair, she couldnt tell him or he'd take this baby just like he'd all ready took Starr. Blair had enoguh and told Todd she was leaving forever. A worried Todd had somebody follow her down to where she was going. Todd later met Blair up in Mexico. A mid-wife no where to be found. Todd delivered "max's baby". Todd gave the baby away, thinking it was Max's and told the sad mother it had died cause it was to small.

Later at home, Todd proosed to Blair again and hse accepted. Blair stopped the wedding to tell Todd their son had died. Todd went to go find his son. Todd came back and married Blair on December 7th, 2001. Todd and Blairhad "adobted" their son Jack. Later Blair found out Todd had told her their baby was dead and their son was really Jack. Blair kicked out Todd and divorced him later. Blair went after attractive Dr. Troy Machver. She tried to brak up Nora and him so Sam could get Nora back. That didnt work. Later she and Sam got back together for another try. Todd came back from the island and found Sam Blair kissing. Blair ran a story on the mob. She got death threats to stop running articles on them. Later Blair went to the park to meet Suzanne-- Starrs Nanny-- Saw Suzanne shot and killed. Blair went into a mental state. It was a set up. The mob thought Blair was in Switzerland to revover from her breakdown and Blair was in hide out in Todd's Penthouse with the kids. Sam was also in on it. While Blair and Sam were still dating, Todd tried to make Blair jeolous with Shawna Quienlin, his new intern. It worked. Blair came back to Todd and told him she forgave him for what he did. Todd and Blair later made love that night. The next morning, the mob found Blair's hiding spot, lucly Todd came to resuce and saved Blair. Sam got suspicious of the mob story and thought Todd set it up. Todd and Blair were about to say I do and Sam ran in with Suzanne!!!
